Name: Mr Tom Snack Bar
Review Text: The store does not have the right name. It‚Äôs not Mr. Tom. They keep the name that is not correct. The food was awful. Overpriced and simply hard to eat. Hot dog, donuts, pizza‚Ä¶ everything was certainly not fresh. Don‚Äôt even know how this store can still be open.

Name: Mr Tom Snack Bar
Review Text: The place is small and very crowded; it is usually busy here. The prices are okay, and waiting for a dish does not take too long. However, pay attention when you order your dish as somebody might steal it from you. The atmosphere feels unsettling and chaotic

Name: Mr Tom Snack Bar
Review Text: Fries are fine, service is not. Got hit & spat on by staff. They gave us the wrong change. If you go, make sure you don‚Äôt get short change. If you get cheated on, call police and you‚Äôll get your money back.

Name: Mr Tom Snack Bar
Review Text: Worst place in Amsterdam. The food is so so but the people working there are so rude. They gave us wrong change. Got incredibly angry about it. Tried hitting us and spat at us. The owner doesn't do anything about it. And we had to call the police to resolve the situation.

Review Text: Great fries! It‚Äôs small and can be busy!

Name: Mr Tom Snack Bar
Review Text: Tourist trap. Stay away! No visible prices in the store. I been asked to pay 12 euros for one little cake and coke.

Name: Mr Tom Snack Bar
Review Text: Absolutely terrible service. One short, disgruntled employee in particular hassled myself and my friends over a private conversation that we were having. There are a million places to eat in the Red Light District. Don't go here.

Name: Mr Tom Snack Bar
Review Text: Staff pretty friendly , cheap and cheerful food , chips with sweet curry sauce very very good and hot dog pretty nice

Name: Mr Tom Snack Bar
Review Text: Worst experience in Amsterdam truely horrible people working here. They shortchanged us 5 euros and then pushed us out and spat on us.
